In remembrance of our father

05 Dec 2006

So my brothers and I have wanted to get a tattoo for a while now that is in remembrance of our father who died one month ago today. Here is a preliminary sketch I did in Illustrator. We're going to have this the basis of the tattoo and have the artist get more creative with it, personalize each one.

Interesting note on login

30 Nov 2006

For a while, I've been annoyed by the default way Drupal displays it's login box automatically if you're not signed in. So I usually just put a link in the footer or primary links to 'user' after enabling clean urls. This works great, but when I did it with Drupal 5, I found that the link that should be entitled Login, was changed to My account!

... read on

30 Nov 2006
